Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2011 03:34PM ShirleyE wrote: Hi, LeesaAnn, I am 63 years old and had my first T/C on December 6.  I have experienced all the side effects I was told to expect.  However, I would like to know if anyone out there is experiencing nightmares?  Very Vivid Nightmares!!
Posts.Title: Taxotere/Cytoxan - December 2011 LeesaAnn AnnieLane
